StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateAlienRegistra.on]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @PersonID int, @AlienRegistra.onNumber varchar(9), @ARNDiscrepancyID int, @ARNStatusID int, @LastEditBy varchar(15) ) AS
IF @AlienRegistra.onNumber IS NOT NULL BEGIN IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[ALIEN_REGISTRATION] WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonID) BEGIN UPDATE [mcriss].[dbo].[ALIEN_REGISTRATION] SET [ARN] = @AlienRegistra.onNumber ,[ARN_STATUS] = @ARNStatusID ,[ARN_DISCREPANCY] = @ARNDiscrepancyID ,[USER_LOGIN] = @LastEditBy ,[UPDATE_DATE] = GetDate() WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [mcriss].[dbo].[ALIEN_REGISTRATION] ([MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] ,[ARN] ,[ARN_STATUS] ,[ARN_DISCREPANCY] ,[USER_LOGIN] ,[UPDATE_DATE]) VALUES (@PersonID ,@AlienRegistra.onNumber ,@ARNStatusID ,@ARNDiscrepancyID ,@LastEditBy ,GetDate()) END END ELSE BEGIN
DELETE FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[ALIEN_REGISTRATION] WHERE [MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID] = @PersonID
END
